response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you, worth $1,000,000. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you have the chance to secure such a valuable asset at a favorable rate.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am confident that this product will meet and exceed your expectations, providing you with unparalleled benefits and opportunities.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
